welcome_message_body: Welcome to Fagnano Olona, a charming city known for its rich history and beautiful landscapes. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer. Buon viaggio! (Have a good trip!)

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Milano Malpensa Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Milano Malpensa Airport, primarily serving low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 4 hours.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linate Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Linate Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lugano Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Lugano Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
